title: Ticket #2151: Test broken $$ handling in classads4
description:
We need a new regression test to test how classads handle broken/invalid $$ expressions, as fixed in #2118. Expected behavior is to not expand them at all. Entering an infinite loop is definitely wrong. Base minimum cases to consider: 

+Foo = "]) $$(["
+Foo = "$$(["
+Foo = ") $$(BAR"
+Foo = "$$(BAR"
